description.en:
The Dyzrupt Platform, the first of its kind on the African continent, is a revolutionary project developed by a team of individuals familiar with Africa and its challenges. The project's overarching purpose is to create new opportunities for African women and men by providing them with a novel, state-of-the-art ecosystem for acquiring skill-based knowledge, coaching, mentorship, as well as creating opportunities for their economic well-being through wealth creation and entrepreneurship, while achieving personal development goals.
 
Dyzrupt Platform has working associated products which aims to demonstrate how we are using our team's expertise to empower women and other Africans as a whole , such as

Dyzrupt dApp - Our decentralized application with a one of a kind voting system.
dApp Features : Send & Receive , Defi , Voting ,  & Wallet.

DYZ Token - which is a voting and governance Token deployed on the waves blockchain powers the entire Dyzrupt Ecosystem.

DYZ AWE- African Women Empowerment will provide funding to support African women to kick-start their entrepreneurial journey at the earliest stages, even if all they have is an idea.
